preferences.description: If checked then the arrow icon will be shown at the bottom or else at the top of the page. You need to refresh page to see changes.
preferences.name: buttonAtBottom
preferences.title: Show button at the bottom

preferences.description: If checked then the arrow icon will be shown at the left side or else at the right side of the page. You need to refresh page to see changes.
preferences.name: buttonAtLeft
preferences.title: Show button at the Left

preferences.description: Use a 32 pixel image instead of 48 pixel. You need to refresh page to see changes.
preferences.name: smallSizeButton
preferences.title: Use small icon

description: This plugin will add one image at the bottom right corner of your page once you scroll your page to some extent. Click on the image and it will scroll you to the top of the page with beautiful animation. You can configure the location of the icon using options page.
author: pratikabu
name: scroll-to-top
